title: Bug 114905: Default value lost in list box after modifying it
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1. New a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value, then click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value, then click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
